page.title: 10TRAFFIC PROBLEMS IN KIRKBY
page.content: Most residents agree that it is very {pleasant}to live in this area because of the{countryside}and slow way of life which many feel has changed little in recent years.Traffic, however,has become very much a problem,especially on Thursday which is{market day,}when stalls are erected in the market square.While{traders welcome the influx of local people and {tourists,}the existing car parks are unable to cope.The town was built long before cars and lorries and is more suited to horse and cart.{Congestion is common in{Main St.}and attempts to keep the traffic moving with various {parking restrictions,}only serve to anger residents who can be fined for leaving cars outside their own houses. A total ban on cars in the centre or some kind of{one-way system}may be the solution.
